results.title: The EffecTs of Amlodipine and other Blood PREssure Lowering Agents on Microvascular FuncTion in Small Vessel Diseases (TREAT-SVDs) trial: Study protocol for a randomised crossover trial
results.text_hl: To test whether @CHEMICAL_Amlodipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ has a beneficial effect on microvascular function when compared to either @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, and whether @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ has a beneficial effect when compared to @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with symptomatic @<m>DISEASE_Cerebral_Small_Vessel_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D059345 @@@SVDs@@@.

citations.NLM: Kopczak A, S Stringer M, van den Brink H, Kerkhofs D, W Blair G, van Dinther M, Onkenhout L, A Wartolowska K, Thrippleton MJ, Duering M, Staals J, Middeke M, André E, Norrving B, Bousser MG, Mansmann U, Rothwell PM, N Doubal F, van Oostenbrugge R, Jan Biessels G, Webb AJ, Wardlaw JM, Dichgans M. The EffecTs of Amlodipine and other Blood PREssure Lowering Agents on Microvascular FuncTion in Small Vessel Diseases (TREAT-SVDs) trial: Study protocol for a randomised crossover trial Eur Stroke J. 2023 Mar;8(1):387-397. PMID: 37021189
